subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Fernando Torres scored twice in a game for the first time in four months as Chelsea claimed a 3-1 win over visiting Rubin Kazan in the first leg of their Europa League quarterfinal.
snippet: Fernando Torres scored twice in a game for the first time in four months as Chelsea claimed a 3-1 win over visiting Rubin Kazan in the first leg of their Europa League quarterfinal.
